statements: SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT data_title, data_description FROM research_data WHERE institution_name = 'Example University';
SELECT researcher_id, data_title FROM research_data WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT data_title FROM research_data ORDER BY data_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE data_title LIKE '%research%';
SELECT researcher_id, data_title, data_description FROM research_data WHERE institution_name='University A' LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_title, data_description FROM research_data WHERE researcher_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE institution_name='University B' ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT institution_name, COUNT(*) AS research_count FROM research_data GROUP BY institution_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT researcher_id, LENGTH(data_title) AS title_length FROM research_data WHERE LENGTH(data_title) > 20 ORDER BY title_length DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, affiliation, email FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, affiliation, email FROM researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT name, email FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University of Science';
SELECT id, location FROM healthcare_institutions WHERE name = 'Hospital ABC';
SELECT name, affiliation FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_institutions ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University XYZ';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, institution FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE analyzed = TRUE;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM institutions WHERE location != 'New York';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT data_text, analyzed FROM research_data WHERE data_id > 100 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM institutions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM researchers JOIN institutions ON researchers.institution = institutions.institution_name;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS research_count FROM research_data GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_description FROM research_data WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM institutions WHERE institution_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, institution_id, research_area FROM researchers WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM institutions ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, data_type, data_description FROM researchers r JOIN research_data rd ON r.researcher_id = rd.researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_name, collaboration_type, start_date FROM researchers r JOIN collaborations c ON r.researcher_id = c.researcher_id_1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT institution_name, location FROM institutions ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, data_type, data_value FROM researchers JOIN research_data ON researchers.researcher_id = research_data.project_id WHERE data_type = 'experiment';
SELECT institution_name, location FROM institutions;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, email, institution_name FROM researchers JOIN institutions ON researchers.institution_id = institutions.institution_id;

SELECT project_name, description, researcher_name FROM research_projects JOIN project_collaborators ON research_projects.project_id = project_collaborators.project_id JOIN researchers ON project_collaborators.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id;
